attributes.action: Arrange for Number 10 website to link to non-partisan biographies of all Prime Ministers (or at least those of 20th and 21st Centuries)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the interests of democracy and education all Prime Ministers shoud be represented to the public. At present website is electoral  propaganda for the incumbent and appears to be in contravention of rules/conventions regarding expenditure of public funds.

rejection.details: Here is a link to biographies of previous Prime Ministers: http://www.number10.gov.uk/history-and-tour/prime-ministers-in-history
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
